name: Scott Morrison Simulator
description:
Finally, you can see if you'd make a better Scott Morrison than Scott Morrison!

Take photo opportunities! Spend time with your family! Appear on Sky News! Do whatever it takes to get elected before the time runs out.

It's my first game and there are still some bugs. Please hit me up with anything you catch. Cheers!

(PS: I don't own a Windows PC. Please let me know if the Windows export is / isn't playable and what I should change to fix that)
